description:
A packable cable lock for security in low-risk areas. It's also useful for attaching your bike to your car rack, trees and large items where there are no bike racks to be found.

  • 15mm overlapping steel shells protect the inner steel cable
  • Cable has a PVC cover to prevent damage to your bike's paint
  • Moulded number on the dial won't wear off
  • Unlock code can be set to your go-to number
  • SCMU mounting system for tool-free installation
  • Abus security rating of 5/15
name: Abus Tresor 6615C Armoured Cable - Combo 15mm x 85cm
